MemoryInfobox.description: 'Piracy|Pirates, known to be a scourge upon the waves, caused a great many to fear for their safety. Thus the mighty Kassandra was hired to clear them from the Aegean Sea|sea.'

General_Description: '''Skull and Bones''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A merchant had a task for Kassandra.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Can I help you, merchant?''
*'''Merchant:''' ''[[Piracy|Pirates]] are making the waters unsafe for travelers.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to destroy all the pirate ships.''
*'''Merchant:''' ''All the boats must be sunk. Every. Last. One.''
(Accept - I'll destroy them.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one for the job.''
*'''Merchant:''' ''This will be worth your while,'' [[Mercenary|misthios]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I should get going.''
Kassandra left the merchant and set sail. She sought out and sank multiple pirate ships before returning to the merchant.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sank pirate ships, and in return was rewarded with [[drachma]]e.
Section_Trivia: *The memory's name is a possible reference to ''{{Wiki|Skull & Bones (video game)|Skull & Bones}}'', an upcoming game by Ubisoft.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
